Row.Text: Potatoes
Potatoes are a staple in food in many regions of the world.
Starchy vegetable consumed by many.
Tea
Tea is a brewed beverage with a bitter flavor prepared from tea leaves.
Aromatic beans coveted by many.
Poppy
Most species of poppies are attractive and are cultivated as ornamental plants. A few species have other uses, principally as sources of drugs and foods.
Both a vital Medical and Recreational Drug.
Titanium

A metallic element, titanium is recognized for its high strength-to-weight ratio. It is a strong metal with low density that is quite ductile (especially in an oxygen-free environment), lustrous, and metallic-white in color. The relatively high melting point (more than 1,650 °C or 3,000 °F) makes it useful as a refractory metal. It is paramagnetic and has fairly low electrical and thermal conductivity.
Valuable metal prized in the Aerospace Industry.
Aloe Vera

Aloe vera is a species of succulent plant that probably originated in northern Africa. The species does not have any naturally occurring populations, although closely related aloes do occur in northern Africa. The species is frequently cited as being used in herbal medicine since the beginning of the first century AD.
Herb used for many medicinal practices.
Jade
Jade is an ornamental stone.
Stone used for many types of ornaments.
Manganese
Manganese is a silvery-gray metal resembling iron. It is hard and very brittle, difficult to fuse, but easy to oxidize.
Metal used in many processes.
Oak

Oaks have spirally arranged leaves, with lobed margins in many species; some have serrated leaves or entire leaves with smooth margins. Many deciduous species are marcescent, not dropping dead leaves until spring. The flowers are catkins, produced in spring. The fruit is a nut called an acorn, borne in a cup-like structure known as a cupule; each acorn contains one seed (rarely two or three) and takes 6–18 months to mature, depending on species.
Strong wood used in building construction.
Squid

Like all other cephalopods, squid have a distinct head, bilateral symmetry, a mantle, and arms. Squid, like cuttlefish, have eight arms arranged in pairs and two, usually longer, tentacles. Squid are strong swimmers and certain species can 'fly' for short distances out of the water.
Deep-sea animal that darts around the ocean.
Lobster
Deep-sea animal is enjoyed by many as a delicacy.
Amber

Amber is fossilized tree resin (not sap), which has been appreciated for its color and natural beauty since Neolithic times. Amber is used as an ingredient in perfumes, as a healing agent in folk medicine, and as jewelry.
Hard crystal made of tree resin.
Tobacco
Tobacco is an agricultural product processed from the leaves of plants in the genus Nicotiana. It can be consumed, used as a pesticide and, in the form of nicotine tartrate, used in some medicines.
Usualy consumed as a recreational drug.
Tin

This silvery, malleable post-transition metal is not easily oxidized in air and is used to coat other metals to prevent corrosion. The first alloy, used in large scale since 3000 BC, was bronze, an alloy of tin and copper.
Most commonly use in Tin cans.
Herder
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of animals.

Each source of [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cow worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cow nearby.
Village Garden
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of food.

Each source of [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, [ICON_POTATO] Potatoes, or [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, [ICON_RES_POTATO] Potatoes, or [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat nearby.
Apothecary
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of herbs.

Each source of [ICON_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera, [ICON_TEA] Tea, and [ICON_POPPY] Poppy worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of [ICON_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera, [ICON_TEA] Tea, or [ICON_POPPY] Poppy nearby.
Miner
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of metals.

Each source of [ICON_TIN] Tin, [ICON_OAK] Oak, or [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of [ICON_TIN]Tin, [ICON_OAK] Oak, or [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone nearby.
Trader
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of goods.

Each source of [ICON_AMBER] Amber, [ICON_JADE] Jade, and [ICON_TOBACCO] Tobacco worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an improved source of [ICON_AMBER] Amber, [ICON_JADE] Jade, or [ICON_TOBACCO] Tobacco nearby.
Fisherman's Wharf
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of seafood.

Each source of [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, [ICON_SQUID] Squid, and [ICON_LOBSTER] Lobster worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must be coastal and have an improved source of [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, [ICON_SQUID] Squid, or [ICON_LOBSTER] Lobster nearby.
Butcher
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of animals.
Each source of [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cow worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Herder.
Grocer
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of food.
Each source of [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, [ICON_POTATO] Potatoes, or [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Village Garden.
Sage
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of herbs.
Each source of [ICON_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera, [ICON_TEA] Tea, and [ICON_POPPY] Poppy worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have an Apothecary.
Metal Smith
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of metals.
Each source of [ICON_TIN] Tin, [ICON_OAK] Oak, or [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Miner.
Merchant
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of goods.
Each source of [ICON_AMBER] Amber, [ICON_JADE] Jade, and [ICON_TOBACCO] Tobacco worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Trader.
Fishing Dock

A dock is a human-made structure or group of structures involved in the handling of boats or ships, usually on or close to a shore. The world's oldest known dock at Lothal (2400 BCE) was located away from the main current to avoid deposition of silt. Modern oceanographers have observed that the Harappans must have possessed great knowledge relating to tides in order to build such a dock on the ever-shifting course of the Sabarmati, as well as exemplary hydrography and maritime engineering. This was the earliest known dock found in the world, equipped to berth and service ships. It is speculated that Lothal engineers studied tidal movements, and their effects on brick-built structures, since the walls are of kiln-burnt bricks.
Each source of [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, [ICON_SQUID] Squid, or [ICON_LOBSTER] Lobster worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a Fisherman's Wharf.
The Dock can only be constructed in a city next to a coastal tile. It increases the [ICON_GOLD] Gold output for certain Sea Resources.
Cattle Driver
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of animals.

Each source of [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cow worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, 1 [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, and 1 [ICON_RES_COW] Cow for construction. City must have a Butcher.
Town Estate
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of food.

Each source of [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, [ICON_POTATO] Potatoes, or [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, 1 [ICON_POTATO] Potatoes, and 1 [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat for construction. City must have a Grocer.
Alchemist
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of herbs.

Each source of [ICON_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera, [ICON_TEA] Tea, and [ICON_POPPY] Poppy worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 [ICON_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera, 1 [ICON_TEA] Tea, and 1 [ICON_POPPY] Poppy for construction. City must have a Sage.
Manufacturer
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of metals.

Each source of [ICON_TIN] Tin, [ICON_OAK] Oak, or [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 [ICON_TIN] Tin, 1 [ICON_OAK] Oak, and 1 [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone for construction. City must have a Metal Smith.
Vender
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of goods.

Each source of [ICON_AMBER] Amber, [ICON_JADE] Jade, and [ICON_TOBACCO] Tobacco worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 [ICON_AMBER] Amber, 1 [ICON_JADE] Jade, and 1 [ICON_TOBACCO] Tobacco for construction. City must have a Merchant.
Exotic Pier
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of seafood.

Each source of [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, [ICON_SQUID] Squid, and [ICON_LOBSTER] Lobster worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 1 [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, 1 [ICON_SQUID] Squid, and 1 [ICON_LOBSTER] Lobster for construction. City must have a Dock.
Racher
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of animals.

Each source of [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cow worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, 3 [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, and 3 [ICON_RES_COW] Cow for construction. City must have a Cattle Driver.
Plantation
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of food.

Each source of [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, [ICON_POTATO] Potatoes, or [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, 3 [ICON_POTATO] Potatoes, and 3 [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat for construction. City must have a Town Estate.
Herbalist
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of herbs.

Each source of [ICON_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera, [ICON_TEA] Tea, and [ICON_POPPY] Poppy worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 [ICON_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera, 3 [ICON_TEA] Tea, and 3 [ICON_POPPY] Poppy for construction. City must have an Alchemist.
Guild
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of metals.

Each source of [ICON_TIN] Tin, [ICON_OAK] Oak, or [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 [ICON_TIN] Tin, 3 [ICON_OAK] Oak, and 3 [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone for construction. City must have a Manufacturer.
Conglomerate
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of goods.

Each source of [ICON_AMBER] Amber, [ICON_JADE] Jade, and [ICON_TOBACCO] Tobacco worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 [ICON_AMBER] Amber, 3 [ICON_JADE] Jade, and 3 [ICON_TOBACCO] Tobacco for construction. City must have a Vender.
Fishing Bay
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of seafood.

Each source of [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, [ICON_SQUID] Squid, and [ICON_LOBSTER] Lobster worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires 3 [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, 3 [ICON_SQUID] Squid, and 3 [ICON_LOBSTER] Lobster for construction. City must have an Exotic Pier.
Cattle Breeder
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of animals.

Each source of [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, [ICON_RES_DEER] Deer, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cow worked in the empire produces +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Rancher in at least 3 Cities.
Farmer's Guild
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of food.

Each source of [ICON_RES_BANANA] Banana, [ICON_POTATO] Potatoes, or [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat in the empire produces +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Plantation in at least 3 Cites.
Pharmacy
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of herbs.

Each source of [ICON_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera, [ICON_TEA] Tea, and [ICON_POPPY] Poppy in the empire produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +2 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Herbalist in at least 3 Cities.
Industrialist
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of metals.

Each source of [ICON_TIN] Tin, [ICON_OAK] Oak, or [ICON_RES_STONE] Stone in the empire produces +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Guild in at least 3 Cities.
Monopolist
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of goods.

Each source of [ICON_AMBER] Amber, [ICON_JADE] Jade, and [ICON_TOBACCO] Tobacco in the empire produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +3 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Conglomerate in at least 3 Cities.
Fishing Lodge
A building used in the processing, storage, and trading of seafood.

Each source of [ICON_RES_FISH] Fish, [ICON_SQUID] Squid, and [ICON_LOBSTER] Lobster in the empire produces +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must have built a Fishing Bay in at least 3 Cities.
